summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing and partial frontend testing for JobFlow job search copilot app. Backend functionality is fully working including authentication, CRUD operations, and AI features. Frontend authentication integration has session management issues preventing complete UI testing.

integration_issues.issue: Session cookies not persisting across page navigation, causing redirects to login page

passed_tests: Daily goals CRUD operations - Create/Read/Update working
Job CRUD operations - Full lifecycle tested (Create/Read/Update/Delete)
Reminders CRUD operations - Full functionality tested
AI job analysis - GPT-5.2 integration working, returns match scores and keywords
AI cover letter generation - Successfully generating cover letters
AI email generation - Creating professional emails for different types
Frontend login page - Loads correctly with proper design
Frontend dashboard - Accessible with correct session cookie
Task creation from UI - Successfully creates tasks through dashboard
Session-based authentication - Backend validates sessions correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend session management issue: The session cookie is not persisting properly during navigation between pages in the React app. This prevents testing of Job Inbox, Tracker, Job Detail, and Settings pages. The ProtectedRoute component or cookie configuration needs adjustment to maintain authentication state across page transitions.

success_percentage.frontend: 40% - Login and dashboard work, but navigation fails due to auth issues
